eu_initiatives: EU energy market regulation and policy initiatives, incl Clean Energy Package. EU climate policy and initiatives, e.g. EU ETS
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Eesti Energia is a member of Estonian Eletcricity Industry Association, World Energy Council Estonia, Estonian Chamber of Trade and Commerce and in a number of smaller local industry associations
goals__remit: Eesti Energia is a state-owned international energy company that operates in the electricity and gas markets of the Baltic countries and in the international liquid fuels market. We offer energy solutions that include electricity, heat and fuel production, sales and customer service and other energy services. Our unique experience and technology in relation to processing oil shale and energy production are held in high regard around the world.
relevant_communication: Eesti Energia has no specific events, publications or projects dedicated to abovementioned policy initiatives
